interests: Apart from my professional engagements, I enjoy spending time being outdoors whether alone or with friends. I love to meet and know new people from diverse backgrounds.
In winter, I like to ski and learn more about ice climbing. During the warmer months, I enjoy cycling, playing futsal, and capturing picturesque landscapes of Finland.

I am an aspiring chef and when indoors I prefer to watch sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows. In my spare time I like to explore latest technology advancements in mobile and web development world!!!
